name: Kaiju Paintball Royale
description:
The Kaiju has won the day! This city is now his to do with as he pleases! Which is to Raze it to the GROUND! . . . Or use it as a playground for his offspring. He just needs a nap.

Play as a little kaiju in a friendly game of paintball with your buddy while the big one sleeps.

How To Play:

TAB - Pause

Left Shift - Sprint     

Left Ctrl - Crouch

Space Bar - Jump

Left Click - Shoot

Goal:  To Claim the opponents flag from their side of the arena.

Your opponent will also go for your flag, so keep an eye on him.

If your health depletes, you are sent to a random point on your side and you have to regain your progress.

Watch out for enemy turrets!

Devlog:

Well this is what I could get done. Even though its not really finished (I wanted to do a lot more with traps and puzzles and better movement), I'm satisfied that I got something working at least. I hope it at least gets the idea across.
